languages.text: "Его цвета пылали столь неистовым алым... Слава Императору, они не опалили наши души!"
"His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"
languages.original_text: "Его цвета пылали столь неистовым алым... Слава Императору, они не опалили наши души!"

traits.locale_text: "His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"
"His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"
"His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"
"His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"
"His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"

languages.text: « Il était nimbé d'un rouge ardent, enflammé par la fureur... C'est par la grâce de l'Empereur que nos âmes n'ont pas été brûlées ! »
languages.original_text: "His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"

traits.locale_text: « Il était nimbé d'un rouge ardent, enflammé par la fureur... C'est par la grâce de l'Empereur que nos âmes n'ont pas été brûlées ! »

languages.text: "Seine Farben waren ein tosendes, wütendes Rot ... Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass unsere Seelen nicht verbrannt wurden!"
languages.original_text: "His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"

traits.locale_text: "Seine Farben waren ein tosendes, wütendes Rot ... Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass unsere Seelen nicht verbrannt wurden!"

languages.text: “他的颜色一片猩红，仿佛鲜血与怒火……感谢帝皇，我们的灵魂没有遭到烧灼！”
languages.original_text: "His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"

traits.locale_text: “他的颜色一片猩红，仿佛鲜血与怒火……感谢帝皇，我们的灵魂没有遭到烧灼！”

languages.text: «Sus colores eran de un carmesí furioso y ardiente... ¡Gracias al Emperador que nuestras almas no han ardido!».
languages.original_text: "His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"

traits.locale_text: «Sus colores eran de un carmesí furioso y ardiente... ¡Gracias al Emperador que nuestras almas no han ardido!».

languages.text: 「あの人の色、狂って燃えるような深紅でした…私達の魂は燃えていない。皇帝よ、感謝します！」
languages.original_text: "His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの人の色、狂って燃えるような深紅でした…私達の魂は燃えていない。皇帝よ、感謝します！」

languages.text: "Renkleri alev kırmızısıydı... İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki ruhlarımız yanmadı!"
languages.original_text: "His colours were a blazing, raging crimson... Thank the Emperor that our souls are unburnt!"
